com.totsp.gwittir.client.beans
Class Binding

java.lang.Object
  com.totsp.gwittir.client.beans.Binding

public class Binding
extends java.lang.Object

This class represents a DataBinding between two objects. It also supports Child bindings. For more information, see Binding in the Wiki.

Author:
Robert "kebernet" Cooper

Nested Class Summary
static class Binding.BindingInstance
          A data class containing the relevant data for one half of a binding relationship.

Constructor Detail

Binding

public Binding()
Creates an empty Binding object. This is mostly useful for top-of-tree parent Bindings.

Binding

public Binding(BoundWidget widget,
               Validator validator,
               ValidationFeedback feedback,
               java.lang.String modelProperty)
Creates a new binding. This method is a shorthand for working with BoundWidgets. The bound widget provided will become the left-hand binding, and the "value" property of the bound widget will be bound to the property specified by modelProperty of the object on the BoundWidget's "model" property.

Parameters:
widget - BoundWidget containing the model.
validator - A validator for the BouldWidget's value property.
feedback - A feedback implementation for validation errors.
modelProperty - The property on the Widgets model object to bind to.

Binding

public Binding(Bindable left,
               java.lang.String leftProperty,
               Bindable right,
               java.lang.String rightProperty)
Creates a new instance of Binding

Parameters:
left - The left hand object.
leftProperty - Property on the left object.
right - The right hand object
rightProperty - Property on the right object.

Binding

public Binding(Bindable left,
               java.lang.String leftProperty,
               Validator leftValidator,
               ValidationFeedback leftFeedback,
               Bindable right,
               java.lang.String rightProperty,
               Validator rightValidator,
               ValidationFeedback rightFeedback)
Creates a new Binding instance.

Parameters:
left - The left hand object.
leftProperty - The property of the left hand object.
leftValidator - A validator for the left hand property.
leftFeedback - Feedback for the left hand validator.
right - The right hand object.
rightProperty - The property on the right hand object
rightValidator - Validator for the right hand property.
rightFeedback - Feedback for the right hand validator.
